    • Method Detail

      • findClassLoader

        public static java.lang.ClassLoader findClassLoader()
        Finds the best suited ClassLoader. This method also handles special cases in Android >= Lollipop where the Boot ClassLoader cannot access specific internal packages.

      • findClass

        public static java.lang.Class<?> findClass(java.lang.String className)
                                    throws ReflectClass.ReflectClassException
        Throws:
        ReflectClass.ReflectClassException
        See Also:
        findClass(String, ClassLoader)

      • findClass

        public static java.lang.Class<?> findClass(java.lang.String className,
                           java.lang.ClassLoader loader)
                                    throws ReflectClass.ReflectClassException
        This is the same as using Class.forName(String, boolean, ClassLoader) only that this method handles a few issues that some times occurs when parsing a ClassLoader. This method also stores an internal cache that speed things up if the same class is searched multiple times.
        Parameters:
        className - Full name of the class to find
        loader - A ClassLoader object. If this is NULL then findClassLoader() is used instead
        Throws:
        ReflectClass.ReflectClassException - This is thrown if the class could not be located

      • instantiateName

        public static ReflectClass instantiateName(java.lang.String className,
                           java.lang.Object... arguments)
                                    throws ReflectClass.ReflectClassException,
                                           ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        Throws:
        ReflectClass.ReflectClassException
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        See Also:
        instantiateName(String, ClassLoader, Object...)

      • instantiateName

        public static ReflectClass instantiateName(java.lang.String className,
                           java.lang.ClassLoader loader,
                           java.lang.Object... arguments)
                                    throws ReflectClass.ReflectClassException,
                                           ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        This is the same as fromName(String, ClassLoader), only this method will also instantiate the class using the constructor matching the parsed arguments. It will search for a constructor using ReflectMember.Match.BEST based on the Class types of the arguments. It will then invoke the constructor and add the receiver to this class's receiver. For more precise constructor search, manually invoke one using #findConstructor(Match, ReflectParameterTypes)
        Parameters:
        className - Full name of the class to find
        loader - A ClassLoader object. If this is NULL then findClassLoader() is used instead
        arguments - Arguments that should be parsed to the constructor. The constructor will be found using the types of these arguments using a best match.
        Throws:
        ReflectClass.ReflectClassException - Thrown if the class could not be found
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException - Thrown if the constructor could not be found or failed when being invoked

      • instantiateClass

        public static ReflectClass instantiateClass(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                            java.lang.Object... arguments)
                                     throws ReflectClass.ReflectClassException,
                                            ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        Throws:
        ReflectClass.ReflectClassException
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        See Also:
        instantiateName(String, ClassLoader, Object...)

        public static ReflectClass fromName(java.lang.String className)
                             throws ReflectClass.ReflectClassException
        Throws:
        ReflectClass.ReflectClassException
        See Also:
        fromName(String, ClassLoader)

      • fromName

        public static ReflectClass fromName(java.lang.String className,
                    java.lang.ClassLoader loader)
                             throws ReflectClass.ReflectClassException
        Find a Class based on class name and return a new ReflectClass instance with the located Class attached to it
        Parameters:
        className - Full name of the class to find
        loader - A ClassLoader object. If this is NULL then findClassLoader() is used instead
        Throws:
        ReflectClass.ReflectClassException - This is thrown if the class could not be located

                                 throws ReflectClass.ReflectClassException
        Attach the Class of a receiver to a new instance of ReflectClass and add the receiver itself to be used with this instance whenever invoking members from it

        Whether or not the class is a nested class

      • getParent

        public ReflectClass getParent()
        This will return a new ReflectClass of the parent class. If this instance has a receiver then the parent receiver will be added as well.

        NULL is returned if this is not a nested class.

      • getNested

        public ReflectClass getNested(java.lang.String simpleName)
        Returns a new ReflectClass instance pointing at a nested class within the current class. If the nested class is not declared as static, it will get a reference of the current receiver which will allow you to instantiate it.

        NULL is returned if no nested class was found
        Parameters:
        simpleName - The name of the nested class. This should be the simple name

      • getNestedInstantiated

        public ReflectClass getNestedInstantiated(java.lang.String simpleName,
                                 java.lang.Object... arguments)
                                   throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        This is the same as getNested(String) only this one will also instantiate the nested class. It will search for a constructor based on the parsed arguments using a best match. If the nested class is not static, it will instantiate the class based on it's parent receiver.
        Parameters:
        simpleName - The name of the nested class. This should be the simple name
        arguments - Arguments to be parsed to the constructor
        Throws:
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException - Thrown if a matching constructor could not be found or if it failed being invoked

      • getParentReceiver

        public java.lang.Object getParentReceiver()
        Returns the receiver of the parent class or NULL if the current class does not have a receiver or if the current class is not a nested instance.

      • getParentClass

        public java.lang.Class<?> getParentClass()
        Returns the parent Class or NULL if the current class is not a nested class

      • getNestedClass

        public java.lang.Class<?> getNestedClass(java.lang.String simpleName)
        Locates a nested class based on it's simple name. Returns NULL if no nested class was found.

        This method will also search super classes if the current class has no nested class matching the name.

      • invokeConstructor

        public ReflectClass invokeConstructor(java.lang.Object... arguments)
                               throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException,
                                      ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException
        Throws:
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException
        See Also:
        #invokeConstructor(Match, Object...)

      • invokeConstructor

        public ReflectClass invokeConstructor(ReflectMember.Match match,
                             java.lang.Object... arguments)
                               throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException,
                                      ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException
        This is a shortcut that will both search for and invoke a Constructor based on the arguments parsed.
        Parameters:
        match - How deep to search for the Constructor
        arguments - Arguments that should be parsed to the Constructor
        Throws:
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException - Thrown if the Constructor could not be found or invoked
        ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException - Thrown if an error occurs while getting the types of the arguments
        See Also:
        #findConstructor(Match, Object...), ReflectConstructor#invoke(Result, Object...)

      • findConstructor

        public ReflectConstructor findConstructor(java.lang.Object... parameterTypes)
                                   throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException,
                                          ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException
        Throws:
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException
        See Also:
        #findConstructor(Match, Object...)

      • findConstructor

        public ReflectConstructor findConstructor(ReflectMember.Match match,
                                 java.lang.Object... parameterTypes)
                                   throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException,
                                          ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException
        Search for a Constructor within this class.
        Parameters:
        match - How deep to search for the Constructor
        parameterTypes - The Class types of the arguments that should match the Constructor. This can also be String representing the whole Class path which will be converted into a Class type
        Throws:
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException - Thrown if the Constructor could not be found
        ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException - Thrown if an error occurs while converting String types into Class types
        See Also:
        #findConstructor(Match, ReflectParameterTypes)

      • findConstructor

        public ReflectConstructor findConstructor(ReflectMember.Match match,
                                 ReflectParameterTypes parameterTypes)
                                   throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        Search for a Constructor within this class.
        Parameters:
        match - How deep to search for the Constructor
        parameterTypes - A ReflectParameterTypes instance containing the parameter types that should match the Constructor
        Throws:
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException - Thrown if the Constructor could not be found
        See Also:
        #findConstructor(Match, Object...)

      • invokeMethod

        public java.lang.Object invokeMethod(java.lang.String methodName,
                            java.lang.Object... arguments)
                              throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException,
                                     ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException
        Throws:
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException
        See Also:
        #invokeMethod(String, Match, Object...)

      • invokeMethod

        public java.lang.Object invokeMethod(java.lang.String methodName,
                            ReflectMember.Match match,
                            java.lang.Object... arguments)
                              throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException,
                                     ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException
        This is a shortcut that will both search for and invoke a Method based on the arguments parsed.
        Parameters:
        methodName - The name of the Method
        match - How deep to search for the Method
        arguments - Arguments that should be parsed to the Method
        Throws:
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException - Thrown if the Method could not be found or invoked
        ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException - Thrown if an error occurs while getting the types of the arguments
        See Also:
        #findMethod(String, Match, Object...), ReflectMethod#invoke(Result, Object...)

      • findMethod

        public ReflectMethod findMethod(java.lang.String methodName,
                       java.lang.Object... parameterTypes)
                         throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException,
                                ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException
        Throws:
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException
        See Also:
        #findMethod(String, Match, Object...)

      • findMethod

        public ReflectMethod findMethod(java.lang.String methodName,
                       ReflectMember.Match match,
                       java.lang.Object... parameterTypes)
                         throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException,
                                ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException
        Search for a Method within this class.
        Parameters:
        methodName - The name of the Method
        match - How deep to search for the Method
        parameterTypes - The Class types of the arguments that should match the Method. This can also be String representing the whole Class path which will be converted into a Class type
        Throws:
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException - Thrown if the Method could not be found
        ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException - Thrown if an error occurs while converting String types into Class types
        See Also:
        #findMethod(String, Match, ReflectParameterTypes)

      • findMethod

        public ReflectMethod findMethod(java.lang.String methodName,
                       ReflectMember.Match match,
                       ReflectParameterTypes parameterTypes)
                         throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        Search for a Method within this class.
        Parameters:
        methodName - The name of the Method
        match - How deep to search for the Method
        parameterTypes - A ReflectParameterTypes instance containing the parameter types that should match the Method
        Throws:
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException - Thrown if the Method could not be found
        See Also:
        #findMethod(String, Match, Object...)

      • getFieldValue

        public java.lang.Object getFieldValue(java.lang.String fieldName,
                             ReflectMember.Match match)
                               throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        This is a shortcut that will both search for and get the value from a Field
        Parameters:
        fieldName - Name of the Field
        match - How deep to search for the Field
        Throws:
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException - Thrown if the Field could not be found or invoked
        See Also:
        #findField(String, Match), ReflectField#getValue(Result)

      • setFieldValue

        public void setFieldValue(java.lang.String fieldName,
                 java.lang.Object value)
                   throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        Throws:
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        See Also:
        #setFieldValue(String, Match, Object)

      • setFieldValue

        public void setFieldValue(java.lang.String fieldName,
                 ReflectMember.Match match,
                 java.lang.Object value)
                   throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        This is a shortcut that will both search for and change the value of a Field
        Parameters:
        fieldName - Name of the Field
        match - How deep to search for the Field
        value - The value to add to the fieldName
        Throws:
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException - Thrown if the Field could not be found or changed
        See Also:
        #findField(String, Match), ReflectField.setValue(Object)

                       throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        Throws:

        See Also:

      • findField

        public ReflectField findField(java.lang.String fieldName,
                     ReflectMember.Match match)
                       throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        Search for a Field within this class.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - The name of the Field
        match - How deep to search for the Field
        Throws:
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException - Thrown if the Field could not be found

      • bridge

        public int bridge(MethodBridge callback)
           throws ReflectClass.ReflectClassException
        Add a hook to all Constructor's of this class
        Parameters:
        callback - A callback instance that will be called whenever someone calls one of the Constructor's
        Returns:
        The number of Constructor's that was affected
        Throws:
        ReflectClass.ReflectClassException - Thrown if no Constructor's could be found or if it was not possible to add the hook due to missing injection systems, such as Xposed Framework and Cydia Substrate

      • bridge

        public int bridge(java.lang.String methodName,
         MethodBridge callback)
           throws ReflectClass.ReflectClassException
        Add a hook to all Method's of this class with a specific name
        Parameters:
        methodName - The name of the Method's
        callback - A callback instance that will be called whenever someone calls one of the Method's
        Returns:
        The number of Method's that was affected
        Throws:
        ReflectClass.ReflectClassException - Thrown if no Method's could be found matching the name or if it was not possible to add the hook due to missing injection systems, such as Xposed Framework and Cydia Substrate

      • bindInterface

        public ReflectClass bindInterface(java.lang.String service)
                           throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException,
                                  ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException
        Throws:
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException
        ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException

      • bindInterface

        public ReflectClass bindInterface(IBinder binder)
                           throws ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException,
                                  ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException
        Parameters:
        binder - The IBinder to bind to the interface
        Returns:
        Itself with the IBinder Receiver
        Throws:
        ReflectMember.ReflectMemberException - Thrown if using an invalid interface
        ReflectParameterTypes.ReflectParameterException - Thrown if an IBinder is NULL
        See Also:
        bindInterface(String)
